melcoe.xacml.pdp.data
Class PolicyDataManagerService

java.lang.Object
  melcoe.xacml.pdp.data.PolicyDataManagerService

public class PolicyDataManagerService
extends Object

This is a wrapper class for a PolicyDataManager class that exposes the management interface as a web service. The wrapper was needed as WSDL does not support classes that container function overloading.

Author:
nishen@melcoe.mq.edu.au
See Also:
PolicyDataManager, DbXmlPolicyDataManager

getPolicy

public DocumentInfo getPolicy(String name)
                       throws PolicyDataManagerException
Retrieves the document of the given name from the document store and returns it as an array of bytes.

Parameters:
name - the document name to return
Returns:
the document as a byte array
Throws:
PolicyDataManagerException

addPolicy

public String addPolicy(String document,
                        String name)
                 throws PolicyDataManagerException
Adds a policy document to the document store.

Parameters:
document - the document to add as a String
name - the name of the document to add. This can be null for extracting the name from the policy itself.
Returns:
the name of the document that was added.
Throws:
PolicyDataManagerException

                     throws PolicyDataManagerException
Removes the document of the given name from the document store.

Parameters:
name - the name of the document to remove.
Throws:
PolicyDataManagerException

updatePolicy

public boolean updatePolicy(String name,
                            String newDocument)
                     throws PolicyDataManagerException
Updates a document of the given name by replacing it with the new document provided as a String.

Parameters:
name - the name of the document to update.
newDocument - the new document as a String.
Throws:
PolicyDataManagerException

listPolicies

public String[] listPolicies()
                      throws PolicyDataManagerException
Lists all documents in the document store.

Returns:
array of Strings that are the names of all stored documents.
Throws:
PolicyDataManagerException

lastUpdate

public long lastUpdate()
Get the time of the latest add/update/delete operation from the document store in milliseconds. The time is based on the document store servers unix epoch time.

Returns:
the time the document store was last updated.

findPolicies

public DocumentInfo[] findPolicies(AttributeBean[] attributes)
                            throws PolicyDataManagerException
Search for policies that contain all the attribute id/value pairs in the array of AttributeBeans.

Parameters:
attributes - Array of AttributeBeans that contain the attributes for which to search for.
Returns:
array of DocumentInfo objects. Each contains the document name and the byte[] data.
Throws:
PolicyDataManagerException

getPolicyDataManager

public PolicyDataManager getPolicyDataManager()
Returns:
the policyDataManager

public void setPolicyDataManager(PolicyDataManager policyDataManager)
Parameters:
policyDataManager - the policyDataManager to set
